United States District Court
Southern District of New York

Caption:
United States v. Jeffrey Epstein

Docket No.: 19-cr-00490 (RMB)
Hon. Richard M. Berman (District Court Judge)

Notice is hereby given that Defendant Jeffrey Epstein appeals to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit from the judgment other Decision & Order Remanding Defendant entered in this action on July 18, 2019 (date)

additional_notes: The document is a Notice of Appeal filed on July 22, 2019, in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York. The appeal is filed by Jeffrey Epstein, represented by Reid Weingarten, against the decision of Hon. Richard M. Berman. The document contains handwritten checkmarks and a signature.
